nodes.text: Havoc Outpost was a rebel rendezvous point used by the fledging rebellion during their early campaigns against the Galactic Empire. It was located on the edge of a cliff overlooking a river. In 4 BBY, Sabine Wren of the rebel crew of the Ghost brought GNK-series power droid EG-86, who carried information for the rebellion, to Havoc Outpost. It was delivered to the astromech droid R2-D2, acting on behalf of Senator Bail Organa of Alderaan.
Havoc Outpost first appeared in "Blood Sisters," an episode of the second season of Star Wars Rebels.
